technical_features.feature_value: Type I core/shell with alloyed intermediate shell
technical_features.source_sentence: High-quality type I core/shell QDs... preferred for EL devices because of their excellent stability and high photoluminescence quantum yield.

technical_features.feature_name: External Quantum Efficiency (EQE) for Red QLEDs
technical_features.source_sentence: InP/ZnSe/ZnS red QLEDs showed an outstanding EQE of 21.4%.
InP/ZnSe/ZnS red QLEDs... maximum luminance of 100,000 cd/m².
entire thickness is <3 μm including encapsulation layers
demonstrated a 4″-scale flexible full-color QD display by combining 413 ppi RGB QLEDs
printed patterns using red and green QDs exhibited a uniform line thickness and a narrow width (~5 μm)
ZnO nanoparticle (NP)-based electron transport layers (ETLs) and the organic hole transport layers (HTLs) are commonly employed.
blue-emitting heavy-metal-free QLEDs with an EQE of ~20% have been reported using ZnSeTe/ZnS QDs

qualitative_insights.main_objective: To present state-of-the-art material, process, and device technologies for achieving full-color quantum dot light-emitting diode (QLED)-based displays using electroluminescence.
qualitative_insights.key_methodology_summary: Combination of core-shell quantum dot synthesis, device structure optimization (e.g., electron/hole transport layer engineering), and advanced patterning techniques including photolithography, inkjet printing, and transfer printing methods.
primary_findings_conclusions: Heavy-metal-free red InP QLEDs achieved 21.4% external quantum efficiency (EQE) comparable to Cd-based devices
Blue ZnSeTe QLEDs demonstrated 20.2% EQE with 88,900 cd/m² brightness
Intaglio transfer printing enabled 3000 ppi resolution for VR/AR applications
Ultrathin (<3 μm) flexible QLEDs maintained performance at bending radii <3 mm
Pixelated white QLEDs showed 2× higher luminance than mixed QD approaches
limitations_discussed_by_authors: Efficiency limitations in green-emitting InP QLEDs (13.6% EQE vs 21.4% for red)
Challenges in large-scale production of patterned EL devices
Rarity of indium (0.1 ppm crust abundance) for InP QDs
Interparticle energy transfer in mixed QD systems causing efficiency loss
future_work_suggested_by_authors: Development of earth-abundant alternatives to InP QDs
Fundamental studies on efficiency roll-off mechanisms
Integration with next-gen AR/VR and 3D display systems
qualitative_insights.novelty_significance_claim: First demonstration of 4-inch flexible full-color QLED display with 413 ppi resolution using transfer-printed InP QDs, achieving commercial-grade performance without toxic cadmium.
qualitative_insights.key_tables_figures_present: Figure 1 (Material/device designs), Table 1 (Heavy-metal-free QLED performance), Figure 3 (Patterned QLED applications)
